products.title: Mouse Honeycomb Dimout Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Mouse honeycomb dimout perfect fit
products.productdescription: Grey is a popular colour and that wont change anytime soon. The mouse honeycomb dimout perfect fit blind will enhance any room its in with its gentle grey colour. If youre after a dimout perfect fit blind and grey is your colour, this blind is for you.  Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The blackout pleated fabric will gently filter the light coming into your room, while still giving you peaceful seclusion looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required all of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.Makeitsafe.Org.Uk to find out more.

products.metadescription: Mayfair ash dimout perfect fit
products.productdescription: For a grey with a darker hue, the moody mid-dark tone of the mayfair ash dimout makes it an excellent choice. products.metadescription: Mayfair noir dimout perfect fit
products.productdescription: Bewitch all who befall your mayfair noir dimout blinds, as their dark glamour creates the ultimate dramatic statement piece. The matt black fabric benefits from extra light and depth created from the shadows of the polyester blind's pleating, giving it a beautifully tactile look. Despite its dark tone, the noir blind is created with dimout fabric to allow light to gently filter through in the daytime, to create a gentle light glow even when the blind is closed for full privacy. Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. products.title: Mayfair Mint Dimout Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Mayfair mint dimout perfect fit
products.productdescription: Get the freshness of a crisp white with the eye-catching charm of a pastel with the mayfair mint dimout pleated perfect fit. This delightful pleated fabric has a gentle checkering effect when viewed up close, that smoothes out from a distance into a creamy mint. The dimout style allows for some light to pass through even when the blind is closed, to enable some light alongside privacy, ideal for daytime rooms such as receptions and conservatories. products.title: Mayfair Cream Dimout Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Mayfair cream dimout perfect fit
products.productdescription: The mayfair cream dimout perfect fit offers unbridled elegance in an easy-fit form. Rather than installing onto the wall, the blind clips to your actual window frame, for a flush fit that integrates seamlessly into your window. When closed the pleated style means the honeycomb fabric cascades down the glass, as well as offering thermal benefits to help regulate temperature. A milky cream tone creates a delicate neutral, which would pair well with more traditional interiors and antique furnishings. Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The pleated fabric gently filters the light coming into your room, while still giving you peaceful seclusion. Looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required

products.title: Mayfair Ivory Dimout Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Mayfair ivory dimout perfect fit
products.productdescription: Experience premium shading in its simplest possible form with the mayfair ivory dimout perfect fit. This blind clips onto your actual window frame, the brackets sliding in to lock onto your window without need of drilling or tools. The pleated style creates an attractive texture in your window frame, rippling down the glass when closed, and additionally provides thermal benefits to help regulate temperature. The ivory tone offers a classical neutral, its creamy butter-tinted hue pairing especially well with wooden furnishings and stately interiors. Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.
